section.name: Welcome to the Common Collections Support Project
section.p: Common Collections Support is a Javatm OSGitm bundle offering commonly used set of Apache libraries for collection manipulations.

ol.li: Sharing commons-jxpath, commons-collections, commons-beansutils libraries with other OSGi bundles.
Utilize 100 percent Javatm component libraries to maximize multi-platform deployment.
Export libraries from an OSGitm bundle.
